issue.title: [R] Improve efficiency of schema creation to prevent performance regressions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18079](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18079). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In ARROW-12105 the functionality implemented introduced some performance regressions that we should sort out before the release.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18079?focusedCommentId=17619116) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
If we may need to take a long time to fix this, can we revert ARROW-12105 for 10.0.0?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18079?focusedCommentId=17619121) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
I was planning to take a look at it tomorrow, if that's not too late?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18079?focusedCommentId=17619122) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
OK. That's not too late. Because we still have some blockers: https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/ARROW/Arrow+10.0.0+Release

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18079?focusedCommentId=17619123) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Great! Ping me again if this one does become the last blocker, and then, sure, we can revert ARROW-12105 if we need to, but I'm gonna see what I can do to try to not need to.
